fields.description: When changing an asset file (usually an image) in the  Resources/ (classic) or app/assets/ (Alloy) folder, Liveview does not trigger an app reload. This topic is a bit complex, since assets are usually compressed and copied to the app-bundle, but a simple build-step-hook should solve this automatically. This is no blocker, but other frameworks already do this, so it's good for improved developer EXP.
fields.summary: Liveview: Updates to Resources/ (classic) and app/assets/ (Alloy) directory do not trigger update
